creator: Eilz2PSAEAA
name: Servicemesh - Garbage collection ns / minute Detector
programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.runtime.total_gc_pause_ns').delta().above(0, inclusive=True).sum(over='1m').publish(label='A')
detect(when(A > threshold(2000000000), lasting='5m')).publish('Servicemesh - Garbage collection ns / minute Detector')
detect(when(A > threshold(5000000000), lasting='2m')).publish('Servicemesh - Garbage collector more than 5s / minute')

rules.description: The value of gauge.consul.runtime.total_gc_pause_ns - Delta - Exclude x < 0 - Sum(1m) is above 2000000000.
rules.detectLabel: Servicemesh - Garbage collection ns / minute Detector

rules.description: The value of gauge.consul.runtime.total_gc_pause_ns - Delta - Exclude x < 0 - Sum(1m) is above 5000000000 for 2m.
rules.detectLabel: Servicemesh - Garbage collector more than 5s / minute
